    • Title: Dhandhanggula

    :1r1r1Dhandhanggula. /0// om̐ avighna nama śidḍi //0//


    [line 1] apasaṁ tabe kamv amariñci [line 2] hamijilakən tatvani smara, [line 3] ḍa1rpuriṁ śabda kaṁ pinet [line 4] muḍa tan vri riṁ laku [line 5] raga milv aṁikət karasmin [line 6] sampun tan iṁapura [line 7] deniṁ saṁ tameṁ vruḥ [line 8] kuma sa1rmet raras [line 9] kumaliṁa hanilad. vijiliṁ sandi [line 10] tilasiṁra saṁ vusman. 01.001

    [line 1] ø hanut ri raśanira sanira saṁ adi [line 2] ḍa1rḍaṁgula təmbaṁniṁ vacana, [line 3] pupuḥ tirvan ta riṁṁ amet [line 4] mahaṙdḍikaniṁ təmbaṁ [line 5] panalimuṙ mendraniṁ budi [line 6] raga ka gəṁ kaḷṁəṁan. [line 7] vuṙ1ryya manaḥ jinum. [line 8] syuḥ śiṙnanniṁ cipta ṁambara, [line 9] pinagatanitvasaṁ rusit [line 10] saṁ nalemoṙr iṁ driya 01.002

    [line 1] ø juvama nut ṣva1rraniṁ sukmalit [line 2] pan amun. cipta daṙpa śuk.skaṙ, [line 3] dibva vahu saṁ kamuṙkana [line 4] məvə duta malulut [line 5] kiraṁ yogha pramada lviḥ1r [line 6] vinoteṁ kanuragan. [line 7] jñana śalaṁ śurup., [line 8] daṙsana traś.na niṁtyaśa [line 9] tan kagivaṁ śuməṁ pamacanani śaḥ [line 10] dyaniṁṁ a1rmriḥ carita 01.003

    [line 1] ø nahan saṁsiptaniṁ amarici [line 2] saṁṁ amagiḥ tusṭa moṁ kaviṙyyan [line 3] riṁ vilatikna pranaḥhe [line 4] pralabda prabu vibuḥ [line 5] vatək da :1v1v1na mule kaśvesiḥ [line 6] hasikəp kasusilan. [line 7] pramaṙta budy alus [line 8] pinampu śakala, [line 9] kasub kar̥ṁə hapunya hadana laviḥ1v- [line 10] boga sadana lumraḥ 01.004

    [line 1] ø tlas deniraṁ amukti karasmin [line 2] vinusana saṁṁ atitaḥ [line 3] mapann atuva vayahe, [line 4] tutug. vr̥tiniṁ tuvuḥ1v [line 5] luvaṙ tanṣaḥ mukti sumilib.     [line 1] ø hatigal tanayestri kakaliḥ [line 2] lanaṁ tuṁgal. hapadudyan maṙga [line 3] putra gana vikan i1v reḥ, [line 4] saṁ yayaḥ tibra lampus.     [line 1] ø vuvusən ki siṁamada kari [line 2] katigal. pjaḥ vvaṙniṁ bapa [line 3] nastapa ha2rpuvara ṁe [line 4] yayaḥ bu dibra lampus [line 5] kavlas aṙśa duka priyatin [line 6] ramestri tumut abela, [line 7] kari tanpa nuśu [line 8] saṁsara ṁmaśi la2rra [line 9] kanastapā hanaṁi rahina vṁi [line 10] yayebu makasabat 01.008

    [line 1] ø tuhu panutuni hyaṁ hamr̥di [line 2] ki paṁuvusan adan avaraḥ [line 3] savṁi tan ana g1+liṁ [line 4] ki siṁa5vmaḍa muvus [line 5] ranakira haja vinaraḥ jati [line 6] hayvage kumaliṁa, [line 7] saṁ vani pamuvus.     //0// sampun. tla86rs iṁṁ anulaṙ, riṁ jəṁ giri kanisṭan. imbaṁ riṁṁ eṙsənya, gəgəṙ camara jajaṙ coraḥ bojana r̥m., śinampunnanuiṁṁ anurat86r. śoma pvan. riṁ matal. hasṭavara nuju yama, navavara nuju keraṁan., sad.vara nuju paniron., catuṙvara86r nuju śri, trivara nuju byantara, vuku daḷm. śoma kalivon si vuye, punika lavə lavəniṁṁ anurat. sastra hagəṁṁ ali86rt. śri gitiṁṁən haraṁ har̥t., hagəpok hanuḍuk haguvək haḍupak hamikal. hanujaḥ, satiṁ sulekraḥ hatiṁgal86r. huvit. corak carek kaya tilasiṁ pacul., t

    Kartika Setyawati
